biotools.summary: Rcompadre and Rage are two R packages to facilitate the use of the COMPADRE and COMADRE databases and calculation of life history traits from matrix population models. It is an R package to facilitate working with the COM(P)ADRE Plant and Animal Matrix Population Databases.

bioschemas.name: Rcompadre
bioschemas.summary: Rcompadre and Rage are two R packages to facilitate the use of the COMPADRE and COMADRE databases and calculation of life history traits from matrix population models. It is an R package to facilitate working with the COM(P)ADRE Plant and Animal Matrix Population Databases.
